org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3

Class TimerPingSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.TimerPingSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MqttPingSender

    public class TimerPingSender
extends java.lang.Object
implements MqttPingSender
    Default ping sender implementation

    This class implements the MqttPingSender pinger interface allowing applications to send ping packet to server every keep alive interval.

    See Also:
    MqttPingSender
